Xin likes other items more and he really shouldn't be building more than one damage item unless he's fed

{{champion:17}}  can build it.


_teemo can build almost any item xD_

There's a few, but some who you'd think can make use of it's unique passive of proccing on-hit attacks every other strike? Jax doesn't proc his ult's passive 'third strike' damage at full stacks, though he does get decent mileage out of the passive stat buffs - It would be a serious contender for an item slot if it worked properly. Generally, it isn't something you build unless you know you're going to win for this reason.

Sadly, Twisted fate seems to have the same problem as Jax, and it would be an amazing item for him to have if it worked properly.

Kayle is probably one of the best users, as is Kog, because not only do they synergize with their stats, the on-hit effect applies properly to their abilities.
